caseId.description: The _id of the entity or its 'name' (depends of the entity)

organisation.description: Name or id of the organisation

share.description: If true, new observables and tasks will also be shared to the organisation

profile.description: Profile used to define the permissions of the organisation members

taskRule.description: Sharing rule to apply to the tasks, can be manual or autoShare
taskRule.default: Sharing rule applied on the case

observableRule.description: Sharing rule to apply to the observables, can be manual or autoShare
observableRule.default: Sharing rule applied on the case
